channel.title: RuneScratch 317 [A New WinterLove Derivative]
channel.description:
[b][u]Intro[/u][/b] So, some of you guys may be familiar with my project [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485900.html]Deltawiped[/url]. I'm having a login issue with that project so it will be put on halt until I have sustained enough knowledge to continue. In the meantime I will be working on RuneScratch 317, and I will either host it or release it as a wL derivative base to work with.
[b][u]About[/u][/b] Runescratch 317 is based off of a crash-patched Blakescape with NIO networking implemented by Advocatus, and I will be using a 317 deob loading 317 cache for a client. The main idea or 'goal' of this server is nothing. I don't really wish to achieve anything with this project. This is mainly to test my programming abilities, and if all goes well, I'll release it or I might even host it if I can find someone who wants to run a server with me. Although I have no main goal for this project, I have high hopes for it and therefore will be implementing my most creative ideas into it. I also hope this project will teach beginners a few things that Delta won't. I will be using lots of inheiritance, object orientation, and efficient code in order to attempt to teach beginners a few good habits (as using wL is not a good habit, may as well teach them a few good habits if they're still going to use it). I really hope that this project will exceed servers like Deltascape, Project Insanity, Devolution, etc. especially Delta, because after almost completing Deltawiped, I never want to see a Delta again. The code was horrible, I mean horrendus! This project may take awhile due to lack of content (Doesn't even have NPC's!).
[b][u]Content[/u][/b] [COLOR=green]Green = Completed[/COLOR] [COLOR=orange]Orange = Started[/COLOR] [COLOR=Red]Red = Not Started[/COLOR]

And lots more...
[b][u]Updates[/u][/b] Will be updated every few days :)
[code]Sat/Jan 14/2012 ~ Tested ________________________
- Downloaded crash patched blakescape with NIO networking and no tpc - Made basic packaging for it - Made the compiler, run, library, etc.
Sun/Jan 15/2012 ________________________
- Added global object spawning (Nullpointer Exception error needs fixing) - Added a database for spawning/deleting global objects - Temporary global object spawning system (Nullpointer Exception error needs fixing) - Limit on temporary global objects
- Python script loading - Javascript loading (nt) (np) - .ini loading (nt) (np)
- Added a Task system
- Removed code that generates random items on first login - Removed code that sets player rights to 2 on first login
Mon/Jan 16/2012 __________________
- Fixed a bug that made the server run extremely slow (Had to do with CycleTasks) - New event system (Using OrathonAPI for events now)
- Location system - Extremely basic Music system (For some reason music doesn't play..) (nt) (np)
Tue/Jan 17/2012 ~ Tested ________________________
- Modified a few features - Read up on some more Java (Specifically HashMaps/Enums/Lists, understand them all now)
Wed/Jan 18/2012 ~ Tested ________________________
- New teleportation system - More clean - Better packaging
Thurs/Jan 19/2012 __________________
- Documentation - Even more packaging tweaks - Sound system (np) - Animation update masks (np)
Fri/Jan 20/2012 __________________
- Permenant text to interface writing (Like Delta's textHandler) - Real teleporting (nt) (np) - Interface opening (nt) (np) - GFX update masks (nt) (np)
Sat/Jan 21/2012 __________________
- Error when all packets would throw a Nullpointer exception fixed - Nullpointer Exception error for objects fixed
- Fixed music, it now plays - All gameframe tabs working - Global Items - Better command handling - Better processing - Better packet handling - Running
Sun/Jan 22/2012 __________________
- Completely redone object system (Hopefully this one works) - General Tweaks
Mon/Jan 23/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Tue/Jan 24/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Wed/Jan 25/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Thurs/Jan 26/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Fri/Jan 27/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Sat/Jan 28/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Sun/Jan 29/2012 __________________
- Studied For Exams
Mon/Jan 30/2012 __________________
- Exam Day
Tue/Jan 31/2012 __________________
- Exam Day
Wed/Feb 1/2012 __________________
- Exam Day
Thurs/Feb 2/2012 __________________
- Exam Day
Fri/Feb 3/2012 __________________
- Added more Python script functions - Heavily revised WorldRS2Object class - Revised PropertyFile class - Starter package
Sat/Feb 4/2012 __________________
- Item database[/code]
[b][u]Pictures[/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/crop5-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/gif1-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/gif2-1.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/crop-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/crop2-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i891.photobucket.com/albums/ac113/zezimo52/crop4-2.png[/img]
